org.madeirahs.shared.v3d
Class V3DPanel.V3DHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      org.madeirahs.shared.v3d.V3DPanel.V3DHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
Enclosing class:
V3DPanel
private class V3DPanel.V3DHandler
extends MouseAdapter

Tracks mouse movement and issues ordered events based on what direction the mouse is being dragged in. The default sensitivity value is 100.

Author:
Brian Groenke
